lines.name: MATT

lines.text: The thing that I gave her, you know, I've never actually given before or used, so--

lines.text: --halved because you are in pretty heavy swamp around the space of where you guys are currently located.

lines.text: The one that you've jammed the blade in and it's nearly dead, it goes, (gasps) looks at you and you watch as its chest pulses and inflates, (explosion) it bursts into a spray of toxic, visceral liquid--

lines.text: Go ahead and make a constitution saving throw--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten, that is still a failure, you take 18 points of poison damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it explodes, it is destroyed, but you are coated in this horrible poisonous liquid that like scars the flesh a bit and it's all in your eyes and your mouth and it burns and it's awful.

lines.text: He's going to attack you twice.

lines.text: Turn Undead might be bad, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are raging, so that is halved to eight, I believe, eight points of bludgeoning damage to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's two attacks on you, Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's four attacks on you from two of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep! There are two of them that are currently rushed in towards you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The highest one is a 15. What's your armor class?

lines.text: No, and I'm going to use Shield of Retribution.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It (crashing) lands and then, (squelching) jumps up with an unexpected speed and is getting ready to come back next round.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 14 points of bludgeoning damage to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 23 and a natural 20.

lines.text: That is going to be a 13--

lines.text: I was rolling to maintain concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those are all the ones you guys have to worry about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then I rolled to maintain concentration and rolled a 25.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I evade one of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, doing your Uncanny Dodge, you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Evasion's only against dexterity saving throws, unfortunately, and Evade, I think, has to be in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that's currently between Yasha and Fjord is going to strike twice, once at each of you.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to take your action to look around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'll shoot the one between Yasha and Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of poison damage to each of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We, how, where do we go? Keep moving through it or try to get back to the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do a Detect Undead really quickly again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In that radius, you sense no other undead in your immediate vicinity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will last for a little while, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that will last for awhile?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing around us right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How many points of damage did we just take?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Turn Undead lasts for a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is, oh awesome, Turn Undead is also still up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eyes of the Grave is until the end of my next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it stays up for the next round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't say anything about concentration on here-

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I don't think Turn Undead is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an instant move and it can, the fear that you put in them can last a minute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that mean you can't detect things right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing? You're all covered in gunk, your body is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- burning from the poison that's now seeped into the outside of your exposed flesh and begun to found its way into your armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be better to save mass heals for when someone goes down so it gets them up and heals everybody, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we just try and put the hut back up? If something comes, we run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're not going to stay away for 11 minutes, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am keeping a very sharp eye out for anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did the mist cover the whole forest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since you began to enter the forest, the mist was slowly hanging around the hut anyway, the house, it's just been getting thicker as the night progresses and the temperature drops.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we just keep walking through the night, no?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With exhaustion already? I think we're just going to make more noise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should chance it for the 10 minutes for the hut.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll jump up and down and start signaling to Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to keep Turn Undead prepped for, if anything comes near us, I'm going to immediately cast Turn Undead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I see a feather move in the forest, I'm going to immediately do Detect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I can understand everything that you're saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we didn't have to talk to you like idiots?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should have told us that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who, I would say all of you guys, everyone make a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's that fucking trunk probably attracted--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They weren't drawn to you until they heard the loud crack and the splash in the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm getting myself a d4 as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And mine is a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, your first one was a natural one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you have a point of exhaustion from last game?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I do have Reliable Talent?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It does say condition is exhaustion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, that would be a 10 plus whatever bonus you have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about, I'd say at this point, you can clock them at about 50 feet from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will cast Major Image and put a giant, thrashing young blue dragon 120 feet in that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you watch as these undead, immediately their heads turn (growls) and begin running in that direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's me, it's me, I did, I did it, I did, (rolls tongue) that's me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you finish creating the dome. (poofing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is a green and brown mottled color and it is less moist inside than out, except for the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will drop it and step inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're all going to just come out and, like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they're just going to pound this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to give it some time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, they're not going to see us, they can't hear us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they come back, we can just Turn Undead and just keep Turning Undead until they all go away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think the group will get through the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And they can hear through the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so we should just be quiet as possible for awhile.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is picking little insects out of the damaged tree that was pulled up and is just feeding them to Frumpkin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I take after and I start doing that for Sprinkle, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stop yourself a couple times before feeding it to Sprinkle because the toxic poison that was thrown all around this area where you guys are planning to sleep--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to help everybody heal overnight, I'm going to take a few minutes to do a Prayer of Healing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all are very, very, very quiet until, you know, hopefully the zombies start to, like (popping).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all get quiet and rest and begin setting up your space here and you're doing what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A Prayer of Healing for 25 hit points to everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does it take to cast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the illusion drops before you finish casting your prayer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're quietly muttering the incantation, I would like you to make a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a general stealth check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can Blessing of the Trickster with him, if you want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right as you finish the healing effect, it flashes, and it heals you all for how much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hit points to all of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Night here is a very dangerous thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At least in this particular part of the swamp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did this place used to be? Why are there so many dead people here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing above a teeny, tiny whisper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys can make history checks if you want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You might, make a history check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I know being close, nearby, raised here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, I don't have advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were both, but I'm also exhausted, so I'll take the lower of the two, which is 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: During the time of the Julous Dominion--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's why they explain all the geothermal activity around here they say is just a remnant of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did see a purple firebird down in that temple of Uk'otoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the people that worshiped this-- The people that worshiped this entity around this area also made a lot of enemies and the Julous Dominion, though they were within its terrain, at some point, they were hunted down and killed in their homeland, pretty much just wiped out around the base of Mount Mentiri.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When you were seeing that vision of Uk'otoa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he showed you something in the mountains or something, like, a location, are we near that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's more, it's closer to the Menagerie Coast and east and inland just a little bit, before you get to the gate that leads to the Empire, if I remember correctly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's always a good D&D game when Peaches comes up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck your mountain and your phoenix.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A steel trap your memory is!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a roll to see if that sounds relatable? Can I roll for relatability?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it could be, who knows?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Especially, then, if the worshipers were hunted down and eradicated.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, if you really want to get crazy, Uk'otoa had three temples, then I'm sure the other two entities might also have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't know if there were, you know, forgotten to time temples around here, do you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I know that this was also a big battleground of the pre-Calamity--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's whispering, that's how she whispers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know of any weird temples around, like ruined temples around these parts that would fit that description?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, based on the history check you rolled, not really, none that you know of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I know that Pride's Call is not far from here and that's where they found the other beacon, it's just north of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, on the other side of this mountain range.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not that this isn't the most comfortable place we've ever been in, but now that we're in here, Jester, do you mind telling us--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the fuck happened in there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As I'm talking, I'm just going to be watching from the direction we came and see if anything's coming out of the mist towards us or anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, okay, so, do you remember when I told you guys that I could maybe do some, like, spells that would maybe affect people's memories and stuff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I told you, I don't know, was I around everyone? We were talking about it with Essek, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "What can I do to make you happy?" And I was like, "Oh change, you know, "help Nott out and change that." And she did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did she realize what you had done?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you know what? I don't know if that's normal because I've never done this before, but just in case, possibly, that it's not normal, I just thought maybe it would be smart to leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send her some, for sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You seem a little nervous now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well yeah, because what if she comes after us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At least, I was, I don't know about you, that witch.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I mean, I don't really feel any different, but I guess I am, now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It really was, like, super creepy magic stuff that she did, so I think she broke it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So if that's true, then I could just change back whenever, I guess.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But what about Beauregard? What about you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I mean, didn't she affect your family somehow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, here's the thing: if she realizes that, you know, I did something, then it's possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I mean, even if she doesn't realize, it still could affect Beauregard, right? Because you have this, your father did something with her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't worry about me or mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's possible that if we killed her, the next day all of your father's grapes would've died.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's probably what would have happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you're not worried about your family or your safety or anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She said that there's a price to be paid, right? A price to be paid for what your father got.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aren't you worried about anything befalling--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't matter, don't worry about it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think it's a price on the family, I think it's a price on him.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe it was his fear and not being able to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what was it? His fear was the price?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like what if he made his entire life so miserable because he was seeking this rich goal that he ended up making himself miserable and Beau miserable and all these people around him miserable and that's what she was feeding off of, that's the price that he paid? He didn't get to live a happy life with his wife; he lived a very sad-- sad life.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And now he has a son.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or maybe the price has been paid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's done is done; you can't turn back time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: True, and it doesn't seem like it's something that gets fulfilled, it just seems to keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you feel like? Do you feel like your life is being siphoned away? Do you feel happier right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you feel like somebody's sucking your life force?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't feel that someone's sucking my life force.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it was a different deal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this is lowering the baseline at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Honestly, I feel guilty right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, that was very brave of you and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't think it was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you talking about? It was a sacrifice for her friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau, you wouldn't just have just been--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But she would've been even more so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, we still would've lost a friend in the end, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau was ready to move away from everything, you were ready to entertain war between nations.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, that's what I'm saying! That-- the thing that I-- I was a coward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all get quiet for a minute and you watch as two of these zombies come lumbering through the swamp, wading.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I open the door to the hut and I just throw one of my ball bearings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I just reach through and I go and toss a ball bearing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the South, there's a screen door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't deal with any distractions right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Caleb, can anybody scry on us in the hut?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we are packed pretty tightly and no one can scry on me, so probably not at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I mean, this isn't going to last forever, right? So if--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't mean you pull the pin on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not an answer, you know that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm this much older than you and you're ready to quit and move on from everything that's good in your world?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To think that you've peaked is insane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, what are you going to do? What are your goals?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm invested now, I want to see peace between these nations, I want to see what this green-cloaked figure is that Jester keeps talking to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to see Nott get back what she wants--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His name's the Traveler and he's really awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We owe it to each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott doesn't seem to care about me, but I care about her, it's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She could've seen through your little spell and taken off your cute little head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, she would've taken off my cute little hands faster.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We would have come running in at the first yelp.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not done until we've saved each other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what's going on in that hut, you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And why would we have come running in at the first yelp? Your delts are crazy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why would we have come running in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because we care about each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fucking shit, we do? Amazing, does that apply to you as well?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you care what happens to Nott?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to do it here but we're all trapped in this bubble.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott still has poop on her leg from--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think my brother's destined for a life of misery, though?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, maybe you can break him from that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like how? Do you want to kidnap him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was kind of thinking about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what if we just suddenly take him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She said, "Oh Luc and my brother," what is his name? JT? TJ?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if just went back and kidnapped your brother and took him to live--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) What if we go up there, I Dimension Door in, I snag him up, bamf out--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe TJ is going to reach an age and he'll reach out and you'll be there to get him out of a bad situation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing makes siblings connect faster than shitty parents.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus, I have a good way of talking with angsty teens, so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And he's probably safer there than, you know, taking-- we can't take a baby on the road with us, you know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We barely took care of Kiri.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is your mother caring at all?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's walking around with a dagger, telling people to go fuck themselves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's caring when she-- she's caring, yeah. She cares.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet when your dad isn't around, your mom's cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's kind of exactly it, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if when your mom's not around, is that okay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you're talking about yourself, it is 100% different and do not fucking compare yourself to my parents.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'm totally absent right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But there's a difference between pursuing the things that make you happy and showing that and being an example to your kids and then just totally fucking being so self absorbed in your own damage that you just transfer all of that and neglect them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What were your parents like? What was your mom's name? (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wow, they sound, those are the most--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I had three older brothers who I didn't get along with too well, but my parents were loving and kind and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My parents would take long trips.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did you cope with that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They'd be gone months at a time sometimes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would've eventually gone for things longer than two weeks to get supplies, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it lonely? Did you miss them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I missed them, but it wasn't lonely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did you know that they still loved you while they were gone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They were being their best selves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My dad wasn't around and he was off doing good work and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was very successful at the work he did, no doubt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, your husband is telling your son how much you love him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I could be there. I can, as soon as we want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could have been there this whole time, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty obvious that Yeza would accept you as you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're also making boatloads of cash, which can totally go towards a great scholarship and a retirement fund, you know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Braces are not cheap these days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They look good, though, they're looking real good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But what if I-- what if when I change, if I-- when I change back, what if I don't want to stay with you guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't have to, that's okay, but just make sure you're doing it for the right reasons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's important that you know that we want you to, but your decision matters the most.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And if you don't stay with us, we'll know you love us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does thinking about going back home and having a family life, is that an exciting thought to you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've tried to kill me a couple times.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, you've tried to kill, you've actually, you've-- I think you stabbed me a few times.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just don't know how, I don't know how to manage it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm not brave enough to do either.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a truth to the idea that you could've gone back at any time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you ever really taken some sober quiet time to think about what it is that you actually want and not what you think you should want?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it's possible to just sit and really try and clear your mind and figure out what it is that would bring you the most peace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never really been religious or anything, but do you think I should sit and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to suggest maybe some quiet meditation, but.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that something you can do without believing in some god thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To just sit and be quiet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only have to believe in quiet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought monk 101 was horse ass-slapping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we're in the swamp of doom here, we can't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're also pressed like sardines because we don't have, oh no, we cleared it, we cleared it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cleared it; you got space.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could do this right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we're really close because we're whispering, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Meditation is about blocking out everything around you and your head and just...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll just poke Nott the whole time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's high level meditation, that's like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I get drunk first or--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I appreciate that sentiment and I know where you're going, but no.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not going to go well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel intimidate it, for sure

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A massive plant that was just beyond the root you were standing on just devours Fjord, just completely vanishes inside of a large flytrap-like pod.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I try to pull it open.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm giving you a d4 on that, too..

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go ahead and attempt to escape if you'd like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to please, yes, I summon the sword and just try and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This plant looks more dangerous than it really is and between the two of you, you manage to get him out and it slowly like (ripping) pulls open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, Fjord, now we know to watch out for those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pod is a purplish color on the outside, which is very glaring, but when it's open, the interior is almost perfectly camouflaged with the extremely green--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So now we know what to look for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We look for ground that looks like ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, who would like to take this next leg?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, well, what skill, what are you attempting to aid this journey with and how--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I was just going to do a survival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could do the survival, that's a way to do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, let me think if there's something better here--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just explain how it pertains to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you rolled high enough, I was like, "I'll figure out something."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try to look at the path and investigate to see if there's a nice, easy way through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation could possibly, yeah, you could give it a shot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Puts the pearl up to her head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It lasts for a whole day?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I love it, though, when it rolls well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It certainly wasn't the last time you rolled, that was really bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And following those paths, those trails, and the signs of edges of trees where you can see darkening coloration from animals that have brushed against it to mark their territory and such, you see the familiar signs of these things and go, "This is probably where we should go." And you do manage to get on for another hour or so without any serious issue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is starting to get dark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the ground look like here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could take a while to search for a place to set up a dome comfortably, that'll probably take the rest of the time before the daylight closes, or you can--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb lights up his hand as they're walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll have to probably clear an area, too, to make--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Find a dome spot or we travel through the night?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I've heard of camping in the trees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there's probably large cats and evil animals, maybe, that live up there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What're you basing that off of?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, the books I read?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're near the menagerie, which means there could be all sorts of strange animal life, it could be very varied.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not quite sure how tall, you know, from where you currently are, they are, but some of them are probably a good 20 or so feet up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to, if I'm nearby, judge the tallest one that I have and climb it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, this one looks to probably close to 30 or so feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, climb it for vantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to smack her butt on the way up and say: Traveler loves you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can take the athletics or acrobatics, your choice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And do I have a, my wall run type of situation, my Unarmored Movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you actually probably don't even have to roll for this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's up with that? That's an interesting looking die you have there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As part of the Slow Fall element?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, with your current movement, you could probably just, don't even have to roll, you can just run up that tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Traveler! And I run up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Beau just gets a running start and (quick footsteps) and vanishes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She thinks it's the Traveler, it's just because Jester smacked her on the ass, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you head up to the top and glance over and immediately, your eyes are taken by the bright sunlight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's, you're getting close, you have about an hour or so before you lose all daylight, it's starting to get that dusk color, but it's still setting in that direction and the bright orange-yellow color of it that way catches you from the dark canopy that you ran up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's what catches you in the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay-- I still have a d4?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She didn't burn it, the bless just holds until you use it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guidance just holds until you use it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guidance lasts for a round, I'll allow it because you ran it pretty quick in one round, sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guidance is up to a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so yeah, you focus your eyes for a second, glance out and you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You think you see, probably about a quarter mile off in a southwestern direction, an area where the canopy folds in a bit, what would be a small pocket that isn't completely flush with the rest of the treeline within your immediate vicinity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The closest you can think of is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A quarter mile west, is that what you just said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have clear the floor from some of the nearby ferns and other--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it my imagination that something probably lives here? I want to just take a look to see if it seems like something big lives inside this tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can tell, elements of this have been carved and hollowed out by probably some sort of a rodent-type creature, based on the tooth marks and the scratches, probably no larger than that size and probably a dozen or so have made homes within the base of the tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How big would I imagine these creatures to be, like this big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like about as big as I just showed you, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if we should camp inside, I think maybe off to the side--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sprinkle, you can make some friends!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think he wants to make--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe he'll want to stay here forever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where he can live, can live a life of an animal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sprinkle, do you want to stay with me or do you want to live the life of a wild creature? Should we make a hut?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After clearing the space a bit and by the time you get ready for it, you are losing the last bit of daylight, so the timing's pretty perfect, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As Caleb is preparing, I'll take a little sip of whiskey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can be reckless if you want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whooshing) (pinging) It lands a little ways off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You told me to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was just sort of kidding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was a test and you passed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, well do you want a sip for being good?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I put it in my bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's unsettling but you feel comfortable here--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just real curious how your night's been over there because it's real heavy over where I live.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you hear all these bugs? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel pretty comfortable, but it's up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay up for just a little bit and I'm going to draw, I'm going to take out Molly's tarot deck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've thought of one of the cards that I want to make.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On one, so you know that optical illusion where one side looks like a old lady and you flip it and it's like a pretty woman?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what I'm talking about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to make a dual card and one side's going to be the hag and then when you flip it over, it's the maiden.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And so that card's called The Hag and Maiden?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does the maid look like you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter) She may be like a little blue color in the folds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And suddenly I have a small capuchin monkey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little speckled spots all over him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sprinkle is curled up, comfortable, in my hood, a little unnerved by all of the crazy noises.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Summoning the monkey all night long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But Jester, you're taking the first watch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In that time that you're finishing your card drawing and getting excited, you can't help but catch something in the corner of your eye and outside of the dome, beyond the edge of the glade, you see a familiar green robe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're just going to go fuck in the woods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step out of the dome and quietly make your way beyond the clearing where--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come." He turns and walks further into the darkness of the jungle, a faint green glow lighting up the space around him as he walks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I glance back at the dome, (sighs) and take off after the Traveler.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he steps to an area and puts his hand to one side, you can see one of the trees very quietly bends and moves aside where a little corner of the jungle is serene and removed from the dense expanse around you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this the oasis? No, this is your oasis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he pulls his hood back--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And are you ready for the absolute truth?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The truth, Jester, is that I have no idea what I'm doing--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just sitting here going, "Fuck off, David Bowie! "Fuck off, no one wants you here, David Bowie."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go back to your home, David Bowie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This was Jester's fault the whole time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, now he's going to be a god, he is a god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's paper pants, it's a cult.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I have no idea what I'm doing"?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly, if I were ever to meet a god and they said that to me, I'd be like, "Okay, and now I believe that you are." (laughter) (clapping) This got way out of hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Traveler Con is just Artagan strangling 500 people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, Garmelie, Artágan, Ártagan? Ártagan or Artágan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Garmelie, and then it was like, "My name is actually Artagan."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was that an illusion for us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah, it was like his changed shape.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did this, I'm so excited.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't necessarily need to be a bad thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not, it's super awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a complicated thing, is what it is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You started a club, maybe you become, maybe--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Married to somebody and then found the secret door to their basement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's totally okay. It's going to be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was the trigger of your trickery last session that he was like, "Okay, maybe she can help me." (laughter)
